post.html: I often find the best way to compare something is just to move it around in production. No simulation, and so long as it is done correctly, you are comparing literal apples to apples.

frontmatter.title: Azure Functions Consumption vs App Service Plan vs Kubernetes - Where to Host?
frontmatter.author: Derek Kershner

authornote.html: Derek Kershner .NET Developer, Kubernetes Architect, and Azure Cloud Consultant, writing about what he figures out along the way.

frontmatter.title: When to use Azure Functions v1 in an App Service Plan for Cost Reasons
